channel.title: Project - for my site
channel.description:
Ok my site needs more PHP and Javascript because my site is based off of CSS. I hope that i get more PHP and javascript because its boring to have a plain website just made up of my site. So this is where you come in. you can post good javascripts and php codes here for my site... I will note that "the names" did the php and javascript coding...etc...
NOTE: edited

item.title: Project - for my site
item.dc:creator: @fellixombc fellixombc
item.description:
@fellixombc wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:6, topic:67602”]Great, put some php on your website. Good idea.

But you won’t replace CSS with PHP, because they aren’t the same thing. They don’t do remotely the same job.[/quote]
Thank you, so i should keep the css and add the php and javascript and do nothing to css… ok works with me… though i can’t do nutin with php…
heres how good i am.

<?php $date (fri) if date=(fri) echo "welcome to (cencored"

item.title: Project - for my site
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Great, put some php on your website. Good idea.

But you won’t replace CSS with PHP, because they aren’t the same thing. They don’t do remotely the same job.
